Description/Summary

Summary:

With the electoral campaign of President Cavalier and his opponent Grim in full swing, Stef Tassel escapes from prison. To avoid law enforcement authorities, he kidnaps a woman, Paula, who happens to be the daughter of Cavalier. Catching sight of Paula and the fugitive, Grim throws himself into their pursuit in the hope of exploding a scandal that will compromise Cavalier.

Language:

French

Language Note:

French dialogue with optional English subtitles; closed-captioned in French for the hearing impaired.

Physical Type/Description:

1 videodisc (140 min.) : sound, color ; 4 3/4 in.

Technical Note:

DVD (PAL, region 2); aspect ratio 1.66 - 16/9 compatible 4/3; Dolby digital 2.0 mono.

General Note:

Originally released as a motion picture in 1971.

"Also known as ... Love Hate"--Internet Movie Database.

"C1971 by Mocky Delicious products. ... Conception graphique c2004 Pathé Vidéo."--Back of container.

Special features: Introduction to the film by Jean-Pierre Mocky; photo album and gallery; trailer; bibliography of film reviews: "Les critiques."

Participant/Performer Note:

Jean-Pierre Mocky, Marion Game, Paul Muller, André Le Gall.

Creation/Production Credits Note:
